text: Rabbul-afwāj farmātā hai, “Ai Nīnwā, ab maiṅ tujh se nipaṭ letā hūṅ. Maiṅ tere rathoṅ ko nazar-e-ātish kar dūṅgā, aur tere jawān sher talwār kī zad meṅ ā kar mar jāeṅge. Maiṅ hone dūṅgā ki āindā tujhe zamīn par kuchh na mile jise phāṛ kar khā sake. Āindā tere qāsidoṅ kī āwāz kabhī sunāī nahīṅ degī.”
